name: THOSE DAMN ALIENS! VR
description: Aliens have boarded your ship; It's time to take arms and defend yourself from the incoming hive. 'Those Damn Aliens' is a VR wave based first person shooter with campaign and survival modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 3.3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
